Info.Title: Daylight
Info.Director: David McCracken, Joel Townsend, Kaidan Tremain
Info.Actors: Jennifer Bacon, David McCracken, Josh Riedford, Sydney Morris
Info.Plot: A horror/thriller about a team of Child Protective Services workers who investigate a series of bizarre child abuse cases in the small town of Daylight, IN. As the mystery unfolds, they ...
